name: diablito
description:
Diablito

- A very tiny roguelike

Fight, get loot, visit town, repeat.

NOTE: Unfortunately there's an occasional gamebreaking bug: If you level up AND pick up loot at the same time, the game will freeze on a blank screen. So if you level up you should not pick loot that round. This will be patched post gamejam.

Made for lowrezjam2019. The plan was to add potions, a shop and more quests but like always, things took way longer to implement than planned! I will probably keep working on the game after the game jam to add more features though.

All the sounds and graphics were pre made by other people, full credits below. I wanted to focus purely on the gameplay to see how far I could push that. 

 

- Credits -

Graphics: 7Soul, Blodyavenger and Henry Software

Sound fx: CactusBear and fusehive

Font: csanyk
